Title: Establishes the position of chief artificial intelligence officer
Summary: Establishes the position of chief artificial intelligence officer and such person's functions, powers and duties; including, but not limited to, developing statewide artificial intelligence policies and governance, coordinating the activities of any and all state departments, boards, commissions, agencies and authorities performing any functions using artificial intelligence tools; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to establishing the position of chief artificial intelligence officer and the functions, powers and duties therefor
